transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, hi sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Haan ji, good afternoon madam.
Executive: Ji sir, Shubham se baat ho rahi hai, Giganet Film se?
Customer: Haan, bol raha hu.
Executive: Okay, sir main Ayushi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se account manager se, aapne call kiya tha hamare number pe contact.
Customer: Haan haan, madam ek baar na ye to hamara registerd ho gaya tha ye live ho gaya apna product vagera.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ab isme kaise working vagera karni hai na uski ek baar training kara do.
Executive: Accha accha, one second sir line pe rahiye please.

Executive: Ek second sir line pe rahiye.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, theek hai sir main aapko na abhi ek link share kar rahi hu aapke mail pe aayega aap use join karega one second.
Customer: Join kaise video call pe join karna hai?
Executive: Haan haan haan abhi Google meet pe join ho jayega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Jisme main screen share vagera karke aapko update kar dungi.
Customer: Theek hai kab karna hai?
Executive: Abhi aap kab available hai sir main abhi turant bhej rahi hu aapko.
Customer: Nahi fir abhi na isko schedule kar dijiye na 2 baje ke baad ka 2:30 baje ka kar dijiye.
Executive: Accha kab available rahenge aap mujhe bataye?
Customer: 3 baje.
Executive: 3 baje aaj?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to main aapko ek baar 3 baje connect kar leti hu waha pe aapka fir main aapko video meeting karke sab kuch step by step aapko explain kar dungi, theek hai? Actually sir aapka jo profile hai na Giganet Film ke wo hamare paas abhi aaya hua tha to automatically hum aapko connect karte hai but thoda sa time diya jata hai ki aisa aap apni services thoda sa aapke uses vagera kar le dekh le agar aapko koi issue hota hai hum bhi aapke samne se connect karte hai actually jo aapka profile hai Giganet Film IndiaMART me wo services nahi dekh rahi hu mera naam Ayushi hai jisse aapne call kiya tha na to directly mere paas transfer hua hai aapka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aisa aapko aap main abhi aapko whatsapp bhi kar dungi guys office ka number hai main aapko ek baar personal number bhi share kar dungi to aapko kabhi bhi koi bhi issue hota hai koi bhi pareshani to aapko ye sochna nahi padega mujhe kis kiske paas call karna hai to aap mere paas directly call kar sakte hai whatsapp call pe dono pe available rahega sir, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To aaiye main turant aapko whatsapp kar rahi hu wo aap number save kar lijiyega aage kabhi bhi koi issue hota hai koi bhi concern hai aap mujhe directly call kar dijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur fir jaise ki aapne na call kiya tha hamare paas to as aapne customer care ke number pe call kiya tha to hamare paas ek ticket open ho gayi hai sir to abhi main aapka wo concern close kar deti hu iske baad close karungi to aapke paas ek mail aayega sir satisfaction ka to please aap usme yes kar dijiyega wo basically mere liye hota hai sir ki maine aapko guide kar diya hai, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan baki main 3 baje aapko connect karti hu aap available rahega meeting me aapko sab kuch explain kar dungi, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji okay thank you so much sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs training on how to use IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a Google Meet session for training.

- Executive shared personal contact for direct assistance.

- Executive will close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect at 3:00 PM for training.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, google meet, profile, contact, ticket
